title: Does Lucian need a buff?
body: So I know lucian is a hard champ. But it doesn't change the fact that he is underplayed. Why is he underplayed? Because he is weak is he not? His ult is only for sniping and even then it's almost barely doing anything. His aa range is so small. His mana problems early are probably fair enough but he needs some better scaling or SOMETHING.. I don't really feel large powerspikes.. I could be wrong though, I  haven't mastered him

> 
> Lightslinger [ Passive ]
> 
> Damage of second shot decreased from 50% of first shotâ€™s damage at all levels to 30/40/50% (increased at levels 1, 7 and 11)
> Duration of double-shot buff decreased from 6 seconds to 2

The values are getting updated in the PBE and his W got some buffs so lets hope he will be better after those updates.
MM turns out I was wrong these nerfs are old. But the new thing they're doing doesn't seem to be much of a buff

he now reaches upto a 60% ad on passive
(checked its the same notes as ff@20 http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-round-up-patch-5-16-44830/)

Considering he's first pick worthy in LCK at the moment i doubt he needs any buffs. He fills a niche, that being a strong laning champion. If you're not able to abuse his early game to get a big lead, you should probably just play something that scales a little better.

Lucian needs to get a lead in lane in order to be good. He's moved from an "all-round" champ (being good at all stages of the game) to more of a Caitlyn style. Win-lane, win-game style.

They are buffing his passive to allow him to scale better, but thats not his problem.

With the tank meta, he also fell out in favour of Jinx/Kalista/Sivir. With the tanks leaving, he may see more play.

I mean Lucian was the undisputed no.1 ADC for like over a year, lets just be happy he's gone for a while hmmm...

Lucian is a burst ad caster which I think is why he doesn't do well in the tank meta. He should become a lot stronger when it is back to the assassin meta. I'm not very sure if Lucian needs a buff but I feel he is good the way he is right now.
I don't think he will do well in either.. Might do better in tank meta tbh. Just had a game with a tf, fiora and talon lmao. Couldn't get within 10kms
